bibl.title: P. Duk. inv. 727: A Dispute with "Proselytes" in Egypt.
bibl.note: P. Duke Inv. 727. Arsinoite (Fayyum), Mid- to Late-3rd century BCE. The papyrus calls into question the position that προσήλυτος was originally a terminus technicus for a gentile convert to Judaism.
bibl.seg: BUTERA C. Jacob and David M. MOFFITT, P. Duk. inv. 727: A Dispute with "Proselytes" in Egypt.
P. Duke Inv. 727. Arsinoite (Fayyum), Mid- to Late-3rd century BCE. The papyrus calls into question the position that προσήλυτος was originally a terminus technicus for a gentile convert to Judaism.
